description.🌟 O'zbekcha: Quvurlarni o'rnatish, ta'mirlash va boshqa santexnik xizmatlar.
description.🌐 Русский: Установка, ремонт труб и другие сантехнические услуги.
description.🇬🇧 English: Installation and repair of pipes and other plumbing services.

description.🌟 O'zbekcha: Uy, ofis va boshqa joylarni sifatli tozalash xizmati.
description.🌐 Русский: Качественная уборка домов, офисов и других помещений.
description.🇬🇧 English: High-quality cleaning for homes, offices, and other spaces.

description.🌟 O'zbekcha: Elektr simlarini o'rnatish va muammolarni bartaraf qilish.
description.🇬🇧 English: Installation of wiring and fixing electrical problems.

description.🌟 O'zbekcha: Og‘ir yuk ko‘tarish, qurilishga yordam berish va boshqa jismoniy ishlar.
description.🌐 Русский: Подъём тяжестей, помощь на стройке и другая физическая работа.
description.🇬🇧 English: Lifting, construction help, and other physical tasks.

description.🌟 O'zbekcha: Bolalarni parvarish qilish, o‘yin o‘ynash, ovqatlantirish.
description.🌐 Русский: Уход за детьми, игры, кормление и присмотр.
description.🇬🇧 English: Taking care of children, playing games, feeding and supervision.

description.🌟 O'zbekcha: Tibbiy parvarish, igna qilish, dori berish va bemorlarga yordam.
description.🌐 Русский: Медицинский уход, уколы, лекарства и помощь пациентам.
description.🇬🇧 English: Medical care, injections, medication, and patient assistance.

description.🌟 O'zbekcha: Yig‘ish, ta'mirlash va qurilish ishlari bo‘yicha usta.
description.🌐 Русский: Мастер по сборке, ремонту и строительству.
description.🇬🇧 English: Specialist in assembly, repair, and construction.

description.🌟 O'zbekcha: Tug‘ilgan kun, to‘y, korporativ va boshqa tadbirlarni tashkillashtirish.
description.🌐 Русский: Организация дней рождения, свадеб и других мероприятий.
description.🇬🇧 English: Organizing birthdays, weddings, and corporate events.

description.🌟 O'zbekcha: Bog‘ va hovlilarga qarash, daraxt va gullarni parvarishlash, sug‘orish va obodonlashtirish ishlari.
description.🌐 Русский: Уход за садами и дворами, полив, обрезка деревьев и благоустройство.
description.🇬🇧 English: Garden and yard care, tree trimming, watering, and landscaping.

description.🌟 O'zbekcha: Kattalar yoki bemorlarga tibbiy yordam, dori berish, parvarish qilish.
description.🌐 Русский: Уход за взрослыми или пациентами, помощь в принятии лекарств, медицинский уход.
description.🇬🇧 English: Medical care for adults or patients, assistance with medication, and general caregiving.
